column5: Just a reminder to all of our Fans and Members, Tuesday April 13th will be our next Chapter Meeting. Our very special guests will be Simon and Melanie Frost from Frostbite Tournament Tackle. We are really looking forward to a visit from these two excellent anglers! This will be an information filled evening. New members are always welcome! See you there, Darrell MacLean Vice President Hamilton Bassmasters.  Meeting will be held April 13 2010 7pm-10pm Dimaggios Italian Eatery 1515 Upper Ottawa St Hamilton Ontario
